List.Name: Number of images managed
List.Tooltip: Select "0x02,firmware and data images" if the firmware manages a data area located in HDPL2 OBkeys to store its secrets (keys, ...), else select "0x01,firmware image only"

Bool.Name: High speed clock activation (500Mhz)
Bool.Tooltip: Activate the high speed clock (500Mhz) during ST-iRoT execution

Bool.Name: Jump into the Bootloader
Bool.Tooltip: Enable the jump in Bootloader when no image is valid, NOT IMPLEMENTED YET

Bool.Name: SRAM ECC management activation
Bool.Tooltip: If selected, ECC (Error Code Correction) will be managed. ECC is a mechanism to prevent mechanisms prevent external attacks.

Data.Name: Firmware execution/download area address
Data.Tooltip: Enter the address of the firmware execution/download area (located in AXI SRAM and aligned on 16 KB)

Data.Name: Firmware area size
Data.Tooltip: Enter the size of the firmware for both download and execution areas (aligned on 4 Kbytes)

Data.Name: Data area index in HDPL2 OBkeys
Data.Tooltip: Enter the index of the data area (from 8 to 31)

Data.Name: Data slot size in HDPL2 OBKeys
Data.Tooltip: Enter the size of the data area in HDPL2 OBkeys

Data.Name: Data area address
Data.Tooltip: Enter the address of the data download area (located in AXI SRAM and aligned on 16 KB)

Data.Name: Data download slot size
Data.Tooltip: Enter the size of the download data area (aligned on sector size)

List.Name: Product state minimal allowed
List.Tooltip: After checking its authenticity and integrity ST-iRoT will execute the firmware only if the product state programmed in option byte is at equal or greater than the "Product state minimal allowed"

Data.Name: Firmware installed external non volatile memory area address
Data.Tooltip: Enter the address of the firmware installed area of the external non volatile memory (aligned on 4 Kbytes) (0x70000000: offset for XSPI1 / 0x90000000: offset for XSPI2)

Data.Name: Firmware download external non volatile memory area address
Data.Tooltip: Enter the address of the firmware download area of the external non volatile memory (aligned on 4 Kbytes) (0x70000000: offset for XSPI1 / 0x90000000: offset for XSPI2)

Data.Name: Data download external non volatile memory area address
Data.Tooltip: Enter the address of the data download area of the external non volatile memory (aligned on 4 Kbytes) (0x70000000: offset for XSPI1 / 0x90000000: offset for XSPI2)

Data.Name: External non-volatile memory size
Data.Tooltip: Enter the size of the external non-volatile memory

List.Name: OEMiLoader offset
List.Tooltip: Select the OEMiLoader offset in flash memory

Data.Name: OEMiLoader size
Data.Tooltip: Enter the OEMiLoader size (aligned on sector size)

File.Name: Encryption key
File.Tooltip: Select the key used to encrypt firmware and data images. When this key is regenerated, both frmware and data images must be processed with Imgtool

File.Name: Authentication key
File.Tooltip: Select the key used to authenticate firmware and data images. When this key is regenerated, both frmware and data images must be processed with Imgtool

Output.Name: Output File
Output.Tooltip: Select the output file .obk including ST-iRoT configuration
